data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Crottini, Angelica, Gehring, Philip-Sebastian, Glaw, Frank, Harris, James, Lima, Alexandra, Vences, Miguel (2011): Deciphering the cryptic species diversity of dull-coloured day geckos Phelsuma (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Madagascar, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 2982: 40-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208124
